changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la liste des ob: New presentation of the list of objects
changelog.md.Possibilité de mettre des labels pour le: Possibility to put labels for the different conditions (optional but allows to execute a scenario following a positioning of the shutter for example

index.md.Ce plugin permet de gérer plus facilemem: This plugin makes it easier to manage the position of your shutters according to the position of the sun
index.md.Ce plugin fonctionne complètement en loc: This plugin works completely locally and does not require an external connection
index.md.un article montrant un exemple de config: an article showing an example configuration of the plugin
index.md.Rien de spécial ici juste à installer et: Nothing special here just to install and activate the plugin
index.md.Le plugin va régler la position de vos v: The plugin will adjust the position of your shutters relative to sun positions (Azimuth and Altitude) depending on condition
index.md.La configuration se décompose en plusieu: The configuration is broken down into several tabs
index.md.Vous retrouvez dans le premier onglet to: You will find in the first tab all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.permet de choisir la catégorie de votre: allows you to choose the category of your equipment
index.md.rend votre équipement visible sur le das: makes your equipment visible on the dashboard
index.md.fréquence de vérification des conditions: frequency of checking the conditions and position of the flaps
index.md.interdit au système de gestion de volet: prohibits the shutter management system from changing its position if it has been moved manually
index.md.le système ferme le volet, vous l'ouvrez: the system closes the shutter, you open it, it will no longer be touched until the "Resume management" command is triggered or if the time to take over control has passed
index.md.la latitude de votre volet\/maison: the latitude of your shutter / house
index.md.la longitude de votre volet\/maison: the longitude of your shutter / house
index.md.l'altitude de votre volet\/maison: the height of your shutter / house
index.md.commande indiquant la position actuelle: command indicating the current position of the shutter
index.md.commande permettant de rafraichir la pos: command to refresh the position of the shutter
index.md.temps pour faire un mouvement complet (d: time to make a full movement (up and down or up and down) in seconds
index.md.si cette condition n'est pas vraie, le p: if this condition is not true, the plugin will not modify the position of the pane
index.md.si coché alors un changement de mode du: if checked then a change of mode of the shutter returns it to automatic management
index.md.Les actions immédiates sont systématique: Immediate actions are systematic and priority
index.md.si coché alors les actions immediates s': if checked then the immediate actions are executed even if it is suspended and without taking into account the order of the conditions
index.md.Le tableau des conditions vous permet de: The conditions table allows you to specify specific positioning conditions, which takes hold of the flap position table
index.md.si la condition est vraie, la position d: if the condition is true, the position of the shutter
index.md.la condition ne marche que si le volet e: the condition only works if the shutter is in this mode (you can put several separated by commas
index.md.Si ce champ n'est pas rempli alors la co: If this field is not filled then the condition will be tested whatever the mode
index.md.On parle ici du mode du volet, cela N'A: We are talking about the shutter mode here, it HAS NOTHING TO SEE with the mode plugin
index.md.agit immédiatement dès que la condition: acts immediately as soon as the condition is true (therefore does not wait for the verification cron
index.md.si la condition est vraie, elle suspend: if the condition is true, it suspends the automatic management of the shutter
index.md.le % quand le volet est ouvert: the% when the shutter is open
index.md.le % quand le volet est fermé: the% when the shutter is closed
index.md.l'action par défaut si aucune condition: the default action if no condition and position is valid
index.md.C'est ici que vous allez pouvoir gérer l: This is where you will be able to manage the positioning of the shutter according to the position of the sun
index.md.angle de hauteur du soleil: angle of height of the sun
index.md.position du volet à prendre si le soleil: position of the shutter to take if the sun is in the Azimuth and elevation limits
index.md.condition en plus à satisfaire pour que: additional condition to satisfy for the shutter to take this position (can be empty
index.md.permet, une fois votre adresse rentrée,: allows, once your address entered, to see the position of the sun (and therefore the angles Azimuth and elevation) according to the hours of the day (just drag the small sun at the top
index.md.Vous voyez ici les planifications de pos: Here you can see the shutter positioning plans made in the Agenda planning
index.md.angle Azimuth actuel du soleil: current azimuth angle of the sun
index.md.angle d'élévation actuel du soleil: current elevation angle of the sun
index.md.force le calcul de position du volet en: forces the shutter position to be calculated according to the position of the sun and the conditions and applies the result to it regardless of the management state (paused or not
index.md.dernière position demandée au volet par: last position requested from the shutter by the plugin
index.md.force la remise en mode automatique de l: forces the management to be returned to automatic mode (note that it is this command that must be launched to switch back to automatic management if you have modified the position of your shutter manually and checked the "Do not take back control
index.md.mets à jour les valeurs des commandes \": update the values of the "Sun azimuth" and "Sun elevation" commands
index.md.Vous pouvez ajouter des commandes \"mode: You can add "mode" commands, the command name will be the mode name
index.md.Le plugin possède un panel de gestion en: The plugin has a management panel for desktop and mobile
index.md.Pour l'activer il suffit d'aller dans Pl: To activate it, simply go to Plugins → Plugins management, click on the pane management plugin and at the bottom right, check the boxes to display the desktop and mobile panels
